name: Monero mobile wallet concept
description: As I've been working on the design for the Monero GUI desktop wallet, I have been exploring a mobile wallet design on the side. It is not complete, but there are 40+ screens in this file that cover many of the most common screens you find in cryptocurrency wallets, and the styling matches that of the Monero GUI. Check my Figma profile to see some of my other work for Monero.
